42-927.Law enforcement agencies; education and training programs.

All law enforcement agencies in the state shall provide officers employed by them with an education and training program designed to inform the officers of the problems of domestic abuse, procedures to deal with such problems, the Protection from Domestic Abuse Act, the Protection Orders Act, and the services and facilities available to abused family and household members.

SourceLaws 1978, LB 623, ยง 27;Laws 1997, LB 829, ยง 9;Laws 2025, LB80, ยง 42.Effective Date: September 3, 2025

Cross ReferencesProtection Orders Act, see section 26-101.
